testsuite.name: com.adityachandel.booklore.service.KoboReadingStateServiceTest

testcase.name: Should return existing Kobo reading state when it exists
Should not overwrite existing finished date when syncing completed book
Should return null when no Kobo state and no UserBookProgress exists
Should handle null progress percent in bookmark
Should return null when no Kobo reading state exists and UserBookProgress has no Kobo data
Should handle invalid entitlement ID gracefully
Should construct reading state from UserBookProgress when no Kobo state exists

testsuite.system-out: 14:33:59.095 [Test worker] WARN com.adityachandel.booklore.service.kobo.KoboReadingStateService -- Invalid entitlement ID format: not-a-number 14:33:59.099 [Test worker] WARN com.adityachandel.booklore.service.kobo.KoboReadingStateService -- Book not found for entitlement ID: 999
